description: This file is a C++ header defining the DobbySpecGenerator class responsible for generating JSON specifications for runtime container configurations. It includes method declarations for creating environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other runtime settings, as well as external includes and namespaces.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating runtime container specifications in JSON format, using provided application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates a JSON string for the container spec based on application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates JSON environment variables from application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates JSON mount points from application and runtime configs.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates RDK plugins section in the JSON spec.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates a minidump plugin configuration.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates App Service SDK plugin configuration.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates network plugin configuration.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a bind mount JSON object for source and destination with options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines whether GPU should be enabled based on app configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves system memory limit for runtime.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves GPU memory limit for runtime.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU is enabled based on configurations.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Returns a string representing CPU cores configuration.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates JSON with classic plugins based on configs.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ethan log plugin configuration.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates multicast socket plugin configuration.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates ION memory plugin configuration.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates Thunder plugin configuration.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates OpenCDM plugin configuration.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates private data mount configuration.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates FKPs mounts in JSON spec.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates tmpfs mount configuration.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates resource manager mount configuration.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Gets working directory for the runtime.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps JSON data.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes a URL string.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds a hole punch port configuration to the JSON spec.
